attributes.title: The most DANGEROUS  app there is
attributes.review: This app is not like any other app. I downloaded and it took so long. My phone  was stuck downloading for five days. I thought it was weird that it took this long. Then after some whenever I opened my phone the app would automatically open as well and it would start talking as if it was talking to me. Then weird things started to happen. I would open my phone and next thing I know I’m standing in my toilet. One time I woke up and I was lying in the freezer. There was a recording that I left for myself and it was me in the freezer yelling “WHO IN THE HELL PUT ME IN THE FREEZER”. I was choking one time and I literally coughed out a hairball. I thought that I had just cut my hair but I also tried EATING IT. I almost tried to get into the gutter one time. I would blackout randomly and wake to me doing weird things. I found myself eating a sandwich out of the trash or trying to eat glass. I would find myself cussing out my friends and eventually I lost them all. I then realized that every time the app is opened I blackout. The voice they use in the app hypnotizes you. By the time I realized this, it became pretty bad. My sister came to hug me and my family told me that I had sprayed her with bug spray and she inhaled it and it got into her eyes. My brother had to smack my head pretty hard for me to snap out of it. I had a headache for the next week. I tried to delete the app but it wouldn’t let me. It was like the App was trying to take over my phone. The app somehow hacked my family’s phones and downloaded the app on it. The blackouts increased and everyone was affected by it. Our house slowly was destroyed. The weird voice the app was transmitting was talking ya into doing crazy things. I woke up one time and I found myself on a cliff about to jump with a hang glider  with NO parachute. I almost stripped down in front of my WHOLE family (nobody wants to see that).  My brother almost JUMPED OFF A PLANE. My sister was trying to fight a DOG. I found my other sister at the top of our house with a blanket around her neck singing 🎶I believe I can flyyyyy🎶 and she JUMPED. Thankfully there was a mattress near by.  In the last two weeks my family and I have done things that could’ve killed us. This app is NOT safe it will take over your mind, and make you do crazy things. This app is too dangerous for any human to have on their device. If you want to survive to live till 40, then I suggest not to download this app.
